Articles.Content: This is my first time in the forums, and I have known Kerbal Space Program for a few years, so I kind of know what's going on with the game such as the 1.1 update. Anything I can do or help on?

Hello The Space Dino and welcome to the forum!

The forum is a valuable resource for learning about and teaching about the game as well as a wonderful venue for entertainment including screenshots, mission reports, video and more.

Take a look around and make yourself at home.

Happy landings!
